plugin.description: \ Validate XML on the request with a given schema. Throws SAXException exception for any validation errors. In a sense, overloading .XML (really adding a method call with the same name as the read accessor) Issues: -Not entirely efficient with streams, -breaks cacheing of xml in request (for now)
